name: UITrackingLayoutGuide
desc: A layout guide that automatically activates and deactivates layout constraints depending on its proximity to edges.

items.name: func setConstraints([NSLayoutConstraint], activeWhenNearEdge: NSDirectionalRectEdge)
items.desc: Configures the tracking layout guide to automatically activate and deactivate constraints when the guide is close to the given edge.

items.name: func setConstraints([NSLayoutConstraint], activeWhenAwayFrom: NSDirectionalRectEdge)
items.desc: Configures the tracking layout guide to automatically activate and deactivate constraints when the guide is away from the given edge.

items.name: func constraints(activeWhenNearEdge: NSDirectionalRectEdge) -> [NSLayoutConstraint]
items.desc: Returns the constraints that the tracking layout guide activates when it’s near the given edge, and deactivates when it’s away from the given edge.

items.name: func constraints(activeWhenAwayFrom: NSDirectionalRectEdge) -> [NSLayoutConstraint]
items.desc: Returns the constraints that the tracking layout guide activates when it’s away from the given edge, and deactivates when it’s near the edge.

items.name: func removeAllTrackedConstraints()
items.desc: Stops the layout guide from tracking any constraints.
